verses.text: Baltasar \w the|strong="H5648"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w a|strong="H5648"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w feast|strong="H3900"\w* \w for|strong="H6903"\w* \w a|strong="H5648"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0506"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* his \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* every one \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* according \w to|strong="H4430"\w* his age.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* being \w now|strong="H4430"\w* drunk \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* \w bring|strong="H0858"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* Nabuchodonosor \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w father|strong="H0002"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* away out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1965"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H1965"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w wives|strong="H7695"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5020"\w* \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*, \w might|strong="H3904"\w* \w drink|strong="H8355"\w* \w in|strong="H1965"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* silver \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w brought|strong="H0858"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* away out \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*, \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w wives|strong="H7695"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w concubines|strong="H3904"\w*, \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* them.

They \w drank|strong="H8355"\w* \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w praised|strong="H7624"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w*, \w of|strong="H0426"\w* brass, \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w wood|strong="H0636"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w stone|strong="H0069"\w*.

\w In|strong="H1965"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* same hour \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w appeared|strong="H5312"\w* \w fingers|strong="H0677"\w*, \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w*, \w writing|strong="H3790"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* candlestick upon \w the|strong="H5922"\w* surface \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wall|strong="H3797"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* beheld \w the|strong="H5922"\w* joints \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* countenance \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* his \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* him: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w joints|strong="H7001"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* his loins \w were|strong="H2122"\w* \w loosed|strong="H8271"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* his knees struck \w one|strong="H1668"\w* against \w the|strong="H0116"\w* other.

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* cried \w out|strong="H1505"\w* \w aloud|strong="H2429"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w bring|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* soothsayers. \w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0560"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*: Whosoever shall \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* shall make known \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w me|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, shall be \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w with|strong="H3848"\w* \w purple|strong="H0711"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* shall \w have|strong="H7981"\w* \w a|strong="H6032"\w* \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* chain \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* shall be \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w third|strong="H8523"\w* \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w*, \w but|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w could|strong="H3546"\w* \w neither|strong="H3809"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* declare \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w to|strong="H3546"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

Wherewith \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Baltasar \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w much|strong="H7690"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* countenance \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w* also \w were|strong="H2122"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w queen|strong="H4433"\w*, on occasion \w of|strong="H1005"\w* \w what|strong="H4406"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* happened \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w his|strong="H5954"\w* \w nobles|strong="H7261"\w*, \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w into|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4961"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*: \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w she|strong="H4433"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0560"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w live|strong="H2418"\w* \w for|strong="H6903"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*: let not thy \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* trouble thee, neither let thy countenance \w be|strong="H2122"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0383"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H7912"\w* \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* thy \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* hath \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w days|strong="H3118"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w* knowledge \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w*: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Nabuchodonosor thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6966"\w* \w him|strong="H6966"\w* prince \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* wise \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, enchanters, \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* soothsayers, thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w*, \w I|strong="H1768"\w* say, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H6903"\w* \w a|strong="H7761"\w* greater \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* understanding, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* shewing \w of|strong="H4430"\w* secrets, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* resolving \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w difficult|strong="H7001"\w* \w things|strong="H3606"\w*, \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* him, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w*, \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*: \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w named|strong="H8036"\w* Baltassar. \w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6903"\w* \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w called|strong="H7123"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* tell \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*. \w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0560"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*: Art thou \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w children|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Juda, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w father|strong="H0002"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w brought|strong="H0858"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Judea?

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* have \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* thou hast \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w and|strong="H2452"\w* excellent knowledge, \w and|strong="H2452"\w* understanding, \w and|strong="H2452"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3792"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* magicians have come \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w*, \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w and|strong="H3792"\w* shew \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H3792"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w could|strong="H3546"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* declare \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* meaning \w of|strong="H2445"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w heard|strong="H8086"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* thou canst interpret obscure things, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* resolve \w difficult|strong="H7001"\w* things: \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* thou art \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* shew me \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof, thou shalt \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3848"\w* \w with|strong="H3848"\w* \w purple|strong="H0711"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* shalt \w have|strong="H0576"\w* a chain \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w about|strong="H5922"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*, \w and|strong="H1722"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w third|strong="H8531"\w* prince \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*.

\w To|strong="H0560"\w* which \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* answer, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*: Thy \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* thyself, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* thy house \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w another|strong="H0321"\w*: \w but|strong="H1297"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w I|strong="H0116"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* thee, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* shew thee \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof.

O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w the|strong="H5020"\w* \w most|strong="H5943"\w* \w high|strong="H5943"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H3052"\w* Nabuchodonosor thy \w father|strong="H0002"\w* a \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w glory|strong="H3367"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* honour.

\w And|strong="H0524"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, tribes, \w and|strong="H0524"\w* languages \w trembled|strong="H2112"\w*, \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w were|strong="H1934"\w* afraid \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*: \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* would, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w slew|strong="H6992"\w*: \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* would, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* destroyed: \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* would, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* set \w up|strong="H6925"\w*: \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* would, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* brought down.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* \w was|strong="H3825"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7313"\w* up, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* hardened unto pride, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H3825"\w* \w put|strong="H5182"\w* down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w throne|strong="H3764"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w glory|strong="H3367"\w* \w was|strong="H3825"\w* \w taken|strong="H5709"\w* \w away|strong="H5709"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1655"\w* \w driven|strong="H2957"\w* out \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w sons|strong="H1123"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* \w was|strong="H1655"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w like|strong="H2939"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4070"\w* \w was|strong="H1655"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wild|strong="H6167"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* did \w eat|strong="H2939"\w* \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* \w like|strong="H2939"\w* an ox, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w body|strong="H1655"\w* \w was|strong="H1655"\w* wet \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*: till \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w knew|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* ruled \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H6211"\w* \w set|strong="H6966"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* whomsoever \w it|strong="H5922"\w* shall please \w him|strong="H6966"\w*.

Thou also \w his|strong="H3046"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w*, O Baltasar, hast \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w humbled|strong="H8214"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3825"\w*, whereas thou knewest \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w things|strong="H3606"\w*:
